entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
